DamageImmunities: Non-magical Bludgeoning, Slashing and Piercing, Psychic

Traits.Name: Rusting Presence
Traits.Content: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the Sunken Drifter must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or take 5 (1d10) acid damage as the air around it corrodes.

Traits.Name: Burnt Trail
Traits.Content: The Sunken Drifter leaves a trail of slick, burnt oil in its wake. The area must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or become difficult terrain until the end of the next turn.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Sunken Drifter makes two attacks with Rusting Slam.

Actions.Name: Rusting Slam
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 4) rust damage. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or have disadvantage on their next attack roll as corrosion eats away at their weapon.

Actions.Name: Corrosive Surge (Recharge 5-6)
Actions.Content: The Sunken Drifter releases a wave of corrosive energy. All creatures within a 15 ft. radius must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 (4d6) acid damage on a failed save and becoming blinded until the end of their next turn, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Actions.Name: Flaming Oil Spill
Actions.Content: The Sunken Drifter ignites its trail of burnt oil. All creatures in a 15 ft. line must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 (4d6) fire damage on a failed save and becoming incapacitated until the end of their next turn due to flames, or half as much damage on a successful one.
